Posts.Content: Paisleyskies wrote: This Post was deleted by Paisleyskies. Dx at age 34. One tumor HER2+ the other Triple Negative. Dx 2/5/2016, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/15 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Chemotherapy 3/7/2016 AC + T (Taxol) Targeted Therapy 5/10/2016 Perjeta (pertuzumab) Targeted Therapy 5/11/2016 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Surgery 8/30/2016 Lymph node removal: Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy 10/11/2016 Whole-breast: Breast, Lymph nodes, Chest wall Chemotherapy 12/21/2016 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone on Xeloda?? Paisleyskies Paisleyskies
